programme.title: Killd My Wife
programme.desc: The morning after a drunken night out, Jeong-hos wife is found dead. All the evidence points to him but insists hes innocent - even though he can't remember a thing. Questioned by a detective, Jeong-ho must recreate and relive his fateful evening, and slowly starts questioning himself. His wifes killer is somewhere in his memories, but what if a drunken blackout is hiding his own guilt?

programme.title: Solis
programme.desc: Asteroid mining engineer Troy Holloway wakes up to find himself trapped aboard a drifting escape pod shooting towards the Sun. Faced with rapid oxygen depletion, Commander Roberts on Earth leads a rescue party to save him. As Holloways hope runs low, Roberts, speaking to him through a weak radio transmission, is determined to save his life before time runs out.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 1
programme.desc: Documentary web series about unexplained mysteries, urbanl egends and unsolved cases originating and/or trending on the internet.

programme.title: Lasso
programme.desc: An Active Senior Tour group outing turns deadly when the crazed, bloodthirsty cowboys from a local rodeo attraction start abducting and killing people!

programme.title: The Winter Lake
programme.desc: When Holly’s dark secret is accidentally uncovered by her new emotionally unstable neighbor Tom, they are pulled into a violent confrontation with her father, who will do anything to keep the secret hidden.

programme.title: Transference
programme.desc: Joshua must protect his twin-sister, Emma, who possesses supernatural abilities and keep her safe from an unstoppable secret agent hunting them for an experiment in a classified government program.

programme.title: Breakdown Lane
programme.desc: When Kirby Lane's SUV stalls in the desert, she must overcome the elements and the lurking undead to get home. Her only companion is Max, the Emergency Car Service Rep trapped in his office by the zombies, and a lone voice guiding her home.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 2
programme.desc: From the mysterious mutilation of the black dahlia up to the 2017 Delphi murders, no stone is left unturned in Dread: The Unsolved; A mysterious docuseries from Dread Central.

programme.title: Tin Can
programme.desc: As the world faces a deadly plague, a scientist on the brink of a cure awakens imprisoned in a metal chamber.

programme.title: Woman Of The Photographs
programme.desc: A skilled digital photographer begins a twisted romance with a woman suffering from body dysmorphia.
